snippet: The United States has said it is “very concerned” by reports that four journalists and their newspaper’s chief executive had been sentenced to 10 years of hard labor.
abstract: United States expresses concern about reports that four journalists from Unity newspaper, along with paper's chief executive, had been sentenced to 10 years of hard labor in Myanmar.
lead_paragraph: The United States has said it is “very concerned” by reports that four journalists and their newspaper’s chief executive had been sentenced to 10 years of hard labor.

headline.main: Myanmar: Wrong Message Is Being Sent About Free Speech, U.S. Says
headline.print_headline: Myanmar: Wrong Message Is Being Sent About Free Speech, U.S. Says
